full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN NGAN SEL BYED ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE'I GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO ZLOG BSGYUR ZHES PA'I MING BTAGS NAS TSIG YID MTHUN CIG TU BYA BA DANG MANG PO YOD PA DANG CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG SNGA MO NAS DON NYER CAN 'KA' BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR MCHOG PAR RANG DANG BSKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA'ANG PHAN PA AI SRID SNYAM PA SLOB GNYER MA BYA BA'I SNYING KHAM CAN CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS GONGS PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BRGYUD LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYI PA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , BKRA SHIS PAR 'GYUR CIG ,)
